title: New York Firm Recalls Sausage Products Due to Misbranding and An Undeclared Allergen
summary: WASHINGTON, Jan. 26, 2015 Oscars Hickory House, Inc., a Warrensburg, N.Y. establishment, is recalling approximately 376 pounds of sausage products due to misbranding and undeclared allergens, the U.S. Department of Agricultures Food Safety and Inspection Service (FSIS) announced today. The products contained soy, milk, wheat...
